analysis.description:
TokenImpl.exchange (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#345-357) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _exchanger.transfer(_value.mul(1000000000000000000).mul(backEthRatio).div(10000).div(decimal_num)) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#350-351)

Reentrancy in TokenImpl.transfer (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#385-407):
	External calls:
	- exchange(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#402-404)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#404-407)

Reentrancy in TokenImpl.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#357-385):
	External calls:
	- exchange(msg.sender,_value) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#366)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#366-367)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#366-367)

TokenImpl.exchange (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#345-357) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-targetToken.transfer(_exchanger,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#355-356)

TokenImpl.decimal_num should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#286)
TokenImpl.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x7f5a7a6a25e06ddc94901cf596f9234f7d190bed.sol#283-285)
